static F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::sanitizePath ( $  path  )  [static]

Ensures that a given path has a / as first and last character. This method only appends a / to the end of the path, if no filename is in path.

Examples:

uploads/temp --> /uploads/temp/ uploads/temp/file.ext --> /uploads/temp/file.ext

Parameters:
string $path
Returns:
string Sanitized path
